title: Google app for Android rolling out option to delete your last 15 minutes of search history
content:
Google has been expanding its privacy features over the past couple of years, and at Google I/O nearly a year ago, the company announced the ability to delete 15 minutes of search history with just one tap, and now that feature is finally arriving on Android.

moreâ€¦

The post Google app for Android rolling out option to delete your last 15 minutes of search history appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: The Google app for Android is now rolling out a button to quickly delete the last 15 minutes of your search history with just one tap.
